shortdesc.ph: Connection mode with Agora private media server.
Connection modes with Agora private media server.
Connection mode with Agora private media server.
Connection mode with Agora private media server.

plentry.pd: 0: The SDK first tries to connect to the specified Agora private media server; if it fails, it connects to Agora SD-RTN™.
1: The SDK only tries to connect to the specified Agora private media server.
0: The SDK first tries to connect to the specified Agora private media server. If the connection fails, it falls back to Agora SD-RTN™.
1: The SDK only attempts to connect to the specified Agora private media server.
0: The SDK first attempts to connect to the specified Agora private media server; if the connection fails, it connects to Agora SD-RTN™.
1: The SDK only attempts to connect to the specified Agora private media server.
0: The SDK first tries to connect to the specified Agora private media server; if it fails, it connects to Agora SD-RTN™.
1: The SDK only tries to connect to the specified Agora private media server.
